messages.message: if the  `customizeHome` step is taking like 25+ mins and still going, is there any operation I can do to fix that? There is no error in the logs but it usually does not take this long unless there is an error.
I donâ€™t have suggestions to speed it up, but sometimes the box is ready to use anyway. Does it still work when you hit the http endpoint or ssh into it?
@Udit which sandbox is having issues?
Looks like interception is having the same issues seen last week, I'm running the mitigation now
ah okay, yah it ended up working
wait no seems stuck again,im gonna restart it

I spun up a sandbox earlier and it worked, then it randomly restarted and got stuck. I deleted it and tried to make another sandbox and now it's stuck :sweat_smile:
https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/weimingwu?cw=dev
@Weiming Wu could you try suspending your sandbox, waiting 30 seconds, then bringing it back up? Idk what's going on, but it's hanging when trying to enable interception for webapp
oh wait no hang on a minute

something is deeply, deeply screwed up with the crafting-aihub cluster :mild-panic-intensifies: did someone recently run some `kubectl` commands to e.g. delete pods? it looks like the cluster has basically been wiped out
That looks very much like the state of a cluster that's been hibernated. :upside_down_face:
good point, but also, like, how haha

yeah looks like the sandbox is hibernated
https://sandbox.console.instabase.com/customer/Engineering/tenant/crafting-aihub/info
yikes, any ideas how we can identify what/who did that? this cluster has been on the do-not-hibernate list forever and cannot be hibernated
Yea https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C05CSGA442Y/p1742315657575389?thread_ts=1742315657.337209&cid=C05CSGA442Y
Looks like the uptime tracking is not accurate, and also it's not flagged as do-not-hibernate, allegedly
How that list is managed, I haven't the foggiest
_sigh_ ok, thank you both :pray: I'll see if I can dig up the doc on hibernation exclusions
I'd open an incident and blast <#C06FA6A23|>
Would open it from the linked thread above though lol
ah, good idea :slightly_smiling_face:
based on ICC logs, looks like something regarding the auto-hibernation got changed yesterday afternoon PT when it began to try hibernating
I don't see the usual incident creation shortcut in the message toolbar for either channel :thonk:
Might need to be 'invited', I'll see if I can
Try now?
I added the aegis bot @sean.donohoe can you try again ? maybe go into more shortcuts and then see
Ah yea if you hit 'more shortcuts' then search 'incid' it should show
Yep all good now, thank you both! Incident channel is https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C08HUUT9JBH
@Weiming Wu your sandbox should be good to go now :sweat_smile:
mine works too now!
hmm, a lot of endpoints are failing like I can't load workspaces. I assume its because services are still getting started?
yea it'll take a whiiilllle to revive, likely
